member.summary: Main entry point for a PrimitierMod

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnSceneWasLoaded(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Runs when a Scene has Loaded and is passed the Scene's Build Index and Name. When overriding call base.OnSceneWasLoaded() before you do anything.

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnApplicationStart
member.summary: Runs after game Initialization When overriding call base.OnApplicationStart() before you do anything.

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnApplicationLateStart
member.summary: Runs after OnApplicationStart. When overriding call base.OnApplicationLateStart() before you do anything.

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnUpdate
member.summary: Runs once per frame. When overriding call base.OnUpdate() before you do anything.

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnApplicationQuit
member.summary: Runs when the Game is told to Close. When overriding call base.OnApplicationQuit() before you do anything.

member.name: M:PrimitierModdingFramework.PrimitierMod.OnRealyLateStart
member.summary: Runs after OnSceneWasLoaded When overriding call base.OnApplicationQuit() before you do anything.
